abstract: The government proposed rules requiring new cars and small trucks to transmit speed, location and direction data, and Alphabet is spinning off its self-driving project.
snippet: The government proposed rules requiring new cars and small trucks to transmit speed, location and direction data, and Alphabet is spinning off its self-driving project.
lead_paragraph: Technology is sweeping through cars, and cars are sweeping through the tech industry. Both of those forces were abundantly on display this week.

headline.main: Daily Report: When Cars and Tech Repeatedly Collide
